        public BotGenerator(LinkedMatrix matrix,
                    int maxBots,
                    int waitTime)
        Constructs a BotGenerator with the specified properties.
        Parameters:
        matrix - Current game matrix.
        maxBots - Max number of bots playing at the same time.
        waitTime - Wait time for the bots after each step.
